Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at Woodlawn/93rd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #147 Outer Drive Express Temporary Reroute at Morse/Sheridan
ShortDescription: #147 Outer Drive Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Morse, Ashland, Pratt and Sheridan, then resume their normal route.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#147 Outer Drive Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Morse, Ashland, Pratt and Sheridan, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to police activity near Morse/Sheridan.

Buses are rerouted due to police activity near Morse/Sheridan.
